sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtninfrmlsanctn ( INFRML_SANCTN_ID /* */ , JOB_SE_CODE /* */ , APPLCNT_ID /* */ , REQST_DE /* */ , SANCTNER_ID /* */ , CONFM_AT /* */ , SANCTN_DT /* */ , RETURN_RESN /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #infrmlSanctnId# /* */ , #jobSeCode# /* */ , #applcntId# /* */ , #reqstDe# /* */ , #sanctnerId# /* */ , #confmAt# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #returnResn# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtninfrmlsanctn SET INFRML_SANCTN_ID=#infrmlSanctnId# /* */ , JOB_SE_CODE=#jobSeCode# /* */ , APPLCNT_ID=#applcntId# /* */ , REQST_DE=#reqstDe# /* */ , SANCTNER_ID=#sanctnerId# /* */ , CONFM_AT=#confmAt# /* */ , SANCTN_DT=#sanctnDt# /* */ , RETURN_RESN=#returnResn# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE INFRML_SANCTN_ID=#infrmlSanctnId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT INFRML_SANCTN_ID /* */ , JOB_SE_CODE /* */ , APPLCNT_ID /* */ , REQST_DE /* */ , SANCTNER_ID /* */ , CONFM_AT /* */ , SANCTN_DT /* */ , RETURN_RESN /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtninfrmlsanctn WHERE INFRML_SANCTN_ID=#infrmlSanctnId# /* */

SELECT INFRML_SANCTN_ID /* */ , JOB_SE_CODE /* */ , APPLCNT_ID /* */ , REQST_DE /* */ , SANCTNER_ID /* */ , CONFM_AT /* */ , SANCTN_DT /* */ , RETURN_RESN /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtninfrmlsanctn WHERE 1=1
INFRML_SANCTN_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
JOB_SE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY INFRML_SANCTN_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#
